dublin_core.dcvalue: Interactive video offers new alternatives in caring for the chronically ill It may not be a new idea but caring for chronically ill patients via two way video is gaining favor as more studies surface suggesting good outcomes as well as cost advantages In fact our diabetes project shows that merely adding video visits to a routine schedule of in person visits is cost efficient And that s just for starters See what kinds of savings are projected when video visits are actually substituted for in person visits
Study suggests video visits have significant cost, quality benefits.
